name: dir-index-html
description: Directory listing HTML for go-ipfs gateways

scripts.build: npm run build:clean && npm run build:remove-links && npm run build:minify-wrap && npm run build:combine-html-css-js && npm run build:remove-unused
scripts.build:minify-wrap:
(echo "<style>" && cat ./src/icons.css ./src/style.css | tr -d "	
" && echo && echo "</style>" && echo "<script>" && cat ./src/script.js | tr -d "	

" && echo && echo "</script>") > ./minified-wrapped.html
